turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: good morning thanks for calling a be trip advisors my name is michael how can i help you

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: hi michael my name is sarah im calling to find out about room availability and rate

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: sure i can help you with that can you please let me know the arrival in departure date and the type of room that you were looking for

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: i'm looking for the look sweet room on the 2627 of this month

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: well as this is a holiday season there are limited rooms available at two hundred and fifty u s dollars per day if you book it now you'll receive a ten percent discount

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: okay i'd like to go ahead and book that great

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: let me share some details on this room and we'll get that booked the good next week room has a separate living room bedroom you're reading group the afternoon t cocktails in canopies it claude five fifty five as well as breakfast for to each day and you'll have full access to the infinity pull on the thirty fifth floor would you like to book a city view s swede or i see these sweet there is just one c view sweet available now and comes with an extra twenty five dollars pretty nice and moist customers prefer this would you prefer that too

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: oh okay then i'll take the sea view deluxe sweet

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: wonderful let me get some information from you and i'll confirm your booking for a sea view the we'd for the twenty sixth than twenty seventh of march only your full name and email and a credit card to hold the reservation

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: sure it's sarah parker in my e mail is sarah dot parker and gmail dot com

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: thank you miss margaret and if i can also get the credit card number to hold the room

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: yes it's a visa expiration date X/XX/

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: okay you're all set miss parker you should be getting an email confirmation shortly also we can arrange for a car to pick you up from the airport at nominal charges if you'd prefer to

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: no thanks i'll take it over

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: okay miss barker if there's anything else we can do for you please let us know

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: i sure will thank you for your help today

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: thank you miss parker and have a great day
